short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects users visiting a Wikipedia page to the Simple version of the same page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make learning easier by simplifying your Wikipedia experience. For every Wikipedia page you visit, this extension will redirect you to the simple version of the article.
